snippet: Fannie Mae, the government-backed mortgage finance giant, has chosen Timothy J. Mayopoulos, who was ousted in a shake-up at Bank of America at the height of the financial crisis, to be its next chief executive.
abstract: Fannie Mae, the government-backed mortgage finance giant, has chosen Timothy J. Mayopoulos, who was ousted in a shake-up at Bank of America at the height of the financial crisis, to be its next chief executive.

headline.main: Fannie Mae Names Its Top Lawyer as Chief
